name: devdocs
title: DevDocs
description: Search through DevDocs documentation sets from Raycast.
author: djpowers

commands.name: search-docsets
commands.title: Search Documentations
commands.subtitle: DevDocs
commands.description: Search through DevDocs documentations from Raycast

commands.name: search-entries
commands.title: Search Entries
commands.subtitle: DevDocs
commands.description: Search through DevDocs documentation entries from Raycast

arguments.name: slug
arguments.description: The slug of the documentation set

commands.name: import-docs
commands.title: Import Documentation Settings
commands.subtitle: DevDocs
commands.description: Import your enabled documentation from the DevDocs website

preferences.name: primaryOpenInAction
preferences.description: Select where entries should be opened using the primary action (other option will be secondary action)
preferences.title: Primary entries action

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
